tdd:
ignore:
  - message
  - '@version'
  - '@timestamp'

testcases:

  - input:
      - '1.2.3.4 - - [30/Apr/1998:22:00:52 +0000] \"GET /english/venues/cities/images/montpellier/18.gif HTTP/1.0\" 200 3171'
    expected:
      - host: localhost
        '[user][name]': '-'
        '[http][method]': GET
        '[http][url]': /english/venues/cities/images/montpellier/18.gif
        '[http][version]': '1.0'
        '[http][response][body_sent][bytes]': 3171
        '[http][response][code]': 200
        '[souce][ip]': 1.2.3.4
        '[ecs][version]': 1.6.0
        type: apache
        '[event][module]': apache
        '[event][dataset]': access
